item.title: Coty Names P&G Insider Markus Strobel Interim CEO
item.description: Coty Inc. (NYSE: COTY) appoints Markus Strobel as Executive Chairman and Interim CEO effective January 1, 2026. read more

item.description: U.S. stock futures rose on Monday after Friday’s higher close. Futures of major benchmark indices advanced. In the last week, the S&P 500 dropped 0.37...

item.title: Mark Cuban Backs GOP Healthcare Plan To Pay Patients Directly But Warns Pre-Care Cash Handouts Is A 'Mistake'
item.description: Cuban endorses GOP-backed health proposal to give money directly to patients, not insurers. He warns against untargeted cash handouts before treatment...

item.title: Rocket Lab Caps Record Year, Lands $816 Million Defense Contract
item.description: Rocket Lab rose after successfully launching its 21st Electron rocket of the year, deploying a satellite for iQPS. read more

item.title: Uber, Lyft Team Up With Tesla Robotaxi Rival Baidu's Apollo Go In The UK
item.description: Uber and Lyft partner with Baidu-backed Apollo Go to bring self-driving taxis to UK by first half of 2026. read more
